item.title: Justin Bieber: A Chronological List of 31 Women Who Slept With Him For Some Reason
item.dc:creator: pauldailly
item.description:
To say that Justin Bieber has had a lot of gal pals during his time in the limelight is like …

Justin Bieber: A Chronological List of 31 Women Who Slept With Him For Some Reason was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
To say that Justin Bieber has had a lot of gal pals during his time in the limelight is like saying Selena Gomez has issues related to him.

It’s so obvious, it barely even needs to be stated.

A number of confirmed relationships, along with a string of flings, have made it abundantly clear that he’s enjoyed the trappings of fame.

Still, you may be surprised at just how much so.

We’ve compiled a list of Bieber’s extensive relationship history from the onset of his rise to music stardom to the present, and wow. 

Just, wow. Here’s hoping he uses protection.

Justin Bieber: A Chronological List of 31 Women Who Slept With Him For Some Reason was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Chantel Jeffries: Back to Banging Justin Bieber!
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: 3 minutesChantel Jeffries is back in the news. Because the model is once again back to taking it from Justin Bieber, …

Chantel Jeffries: Back to Banging Justin Bieber! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 3 minutes

Chantel Jeffries is back in the news.

Because the model is once again back to taking it from Justin Bieber, according to a new report.

Jeffries has been in and out of Bieber’s life bed for years now.

She was actually with the artist on the night he got a DUI in Miami, way back in January of 2014.

We last wrote about Jeffries two years ago, after reports surfaced that she was present at a party also attended by Bieber.

In this latest sighting, the 22-year old singer performed at Madison Square Garden in New York City on Monday night, reserving a seat at the famous arena for his occasional female conquest.

The busty brunette was seen enjoying the show from the audience, cheering Bieber along throughout each set.

"Chantel and Bieber have been hanging out for the past few months," an insider tells E! News. "Last night Chantel went to see Bieber in concert. Bieber got [her] tickets."

That’s not all her got her, we bet!

(We mean he probably also got her off, as in… he probably also gave her an orgasm during sex later that night.)

9 Flirty Photos of Chantel Jeffries

VIEW GALLERY

Following the concert, Justin allegedly took Jeffries out for an especially romantic, private date The Big Apple.

In what way, exactly?

He actually rented out an entire theater at AMC Theaters in Times Square so they could check out The Secret Life of Pets together.

How sweet, right?!?

But also, how rude to Selena Gomez.

Back in 2011, Bieber rented out The Staples Center for a special night with his then-girlfriend, as they viewed Titantic together at the time.

We can’t totally confirm that Bieber pulled a very similar move with Jeffries last night, but he did share a photo on Instagram of his feet kicked up inside a very empty movie theater.

See for yourself:

9 Flirty Photos of Chantel Jeffries

VIEW GALLERY

"They are sleeping together," a source very simply says of Bieber and Jeffries, adding:

"She went back to his hotel and she spent the night. Bieber likes Chantel he thinks she is a great girl. Chantel would really date Bieber exclusively if he was ready. They have been good friends for a while."

VERY good friends, apparently.

After the DUI in 2014, Jeffries was all over the news.

There were reports that she had been arrested five times and she grew so sick of the negative attention that she issued the following statement to E! News:

"I have been overwhelmed by the negative attention I have recently received in the media. My family and I are particularly upset about the false accusations which have been published concerning my criminal history…

"What has happened to me is wrong. I want people in general, and the media in particular, to consider the impact their disparaging comments have on the individual; especially when their comments are inaccurate."

Sadly, we’re guessing Chantel Jeffries is in for a lot more negative attention over the next few days after this story goes viral.

Justin Bieber Emoji Line: It’s Here!

VIEW GALLERY

Chantel Jeffries: Back to Banging Justin Bieber! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Justin Bieber Parties With Johnny Manziel, Cops Get Called TWICE!
item.dc:creator: Tyler Johnson
item.description:
Reading Time: < 1 minuteJustin Bieber moved into a new condo recently, and he seems intent on finding out how many times he have the cops …

Justin Bieber Parties With Johnny Manziel, Cops Get Called TWICE! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Justin Bieber moved into a new condo recently, and he seems intent on finding out how many times he have the cops called on him before he’s booted from his ritzy new digs altogether.

Last night, Justin had some unexpected help with the ruckus-causing:

That’s the Biebs with Tyrese, Floyd Mayweather, and Johnny Football himself – Johnny Manziel.

Cops responded to a late-night call from neighbors that the music in Justin’s unit was too loud. They spoke with someone in the residence and the tunes were turned down.

Just hours later, however, neighbors complained again, as a group of young Beliebers had gathered outside the apartment building and were shouting Justin’s name in unison.

 

Also at the party was Bieber’s ex, Chantel Jeffries – a model who’s rumored to be causing a break up between Bieber and Gomez.

Chantel’s attention was likely divided last night, as Jeffries and Manziel went clubbing in the past, and they’re rumored to have hooked up.

So yeah, Manziel has yet to take a snap in the NFL and he’s already making headlines for partying with Bieber and banging models. Good luck, Cleveland!

25 Reasons Justin Bieber Needs to Get Punched

VIEW GALLERY

Justin Bieber Parties With Johnny Manziel, Cops Get Called TWICE! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez: Breaking Up Because of Chantel Jeffries?
item.dc:creator: Tyler Johnson
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesJustin Bieber and Chantel Jeffries have a long history together and just this past weekend, Justin and Chantel posted Instagram photos, in …

Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez: Breaking Up Because of Chantel Jeffries? was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Justin Bieber and Chantel Jeffries have a long history together and just this past weekend, Justin and Chantel posted Instagram photos, in which they were seen getting very close (and being joined by a model friend of Chantel’s)

Needless to say, Bieber’s girlfriend Selena Gomez was none too pleased by the pics and sources close to the couple say things got ugly when Selena confronted Justin about his flirtatious ways.

"He did what he always does and got super defensive – now they’re not talking and Selena is hysterical, " says an unidentified friend of Selena’s. "Seeing Justin with other girsl is horrible for her. It’s driving her crazy. 

"She doesn’t understand why he does this to her and she doesn’t know what to do. He’s got her questioning everything."

 

Selena and Justin got back together just weeks ago after years of on-again, off-again drama.

Insiders say Selena is well aware that Justin is far from the ideal boyfriend, but she can’t seem to get over her feelings for the troubled pop star:

"She doesn’t trust him, but she can’t give up on him because she doesn’t feel like she can live without him," says one source. "She’s miserable, but she doesn’t want anyone to know how upset she is, especially Justin."

Justin has exerted his bad influence on Selena throughout their relationship. According to some reports – most recently, Bieber and Gomez were spotted doing cocaine in a nightclub shortly after their reconciliation.

Needless to say, many fans and friends are eager to see Selena cut Justin loose.

Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez Pictures: Young, Star-Crossed Love

VIEW GALLERY

Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez: Breaking Up Because of Chantel Jeffries? was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Justin Bieber Hops In Bed With Two Models, Posts Crotch Selfie on Instagram
item.dc:creator: Tyler Johnson
item.description:
Reading Time: < 1 minuteJustin Bieber and Selena Gomez are back together, but apparently someone forgot to tell Justin. The Biebs hung out with …

Justin Bieber Hops In Bed With Two Models, Posts Crotch Selfie on Instagram was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez are back together, but apparently someone forgot to tell Justin.

The Biebs hung out with models Chantel Jeffries and Catherine Paiz over the weekend and the threesome three friends posted some seriously suggestive selfies.

On the left, that’s Justin lying down with the two women, and knowing what a classy gentleman he is, we’re sure he snapped this photo, wished the ladies a pleasant evening, and escorted them home. 

Just kidding, he totally banged both of them.

Normally, the fact that Bieber is sleazing his way into another model’s pants wouldn’t be news, but given that Justin and Selena started doing cocaine together again just last week, we think it’s a little soon for him to be spreading his diseases elsewhere.

 

You may remember Chantel from when Jeffries drag raced with Bieber, leading to Justin’s arrest.

So it’s safe to say she doesn’t bring out the best in Bieber, but once you see some pics of Chantel in the gallery , you might have an easier time understanding why Justin can’t bring himself to say goodbye.

We still have no explanation for the weird crotch’s eye-view selfie. That’s just JB being a douche.

9 Flirty Photos of Chantel Jeffries

VIEW GALLERY

Justin Bieber Hops In Bed With Two Models, Posts Crotch Selfie on Instagram was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Chantel Jeffries: Clubbing with Johnny Manziel!
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: < 1 minuteBased on the following photo, Johnny Football may be throwing spirals through the goal posts of Chantel Jeffries… if you know what …

Chantel Jeffries: Clubbing with Johnny Manziel! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Based on the following photo, Johnny Football may be throwing spirals through the goal posts of Chantel Jeffries… if you know what we mean!

The Cleveland Browns first round draft pick and former Heisman Trophy winner was spotted partying in Houston over the weekend with Chantel Jeffries, the same Chantel Jeffries who was seated alongside Justin Bieber when the singer was pulled over for drunk driving in January.

And who was then linked romantically to the singer for a few weeks.

Jeffries has also dated Washington Redskins wide receiver DeSean Jackson.

 

If she’s now receiving curl patterns (YEAH!) or button hooks (OOOHHH YEAH!) from Johnny Manziel, this has to be considered an upgrade over Bieber.

Both he and Justin show a commitment to partying and to trolling their haters, but Manziel’s career is just getting started.

Bieber, conversely, seemed intent on destroying whatever good will he’s built up over the years by acting like a general jackass. He’s also back together with Selena Gomez.

You never really had his heart, Chantel. You made the right choice.

9 Flirty Photos of Chantel Jeffries

VIEW GALLERY

Chantel Jeffries: Clubbing with Johnny Manziel! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Justin Bieber Drinks Wine, Enjoys “Classy Night” with Chantel Jeffries
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: < 1 minuteJustin Bieber is just trolling the police at this point. With the singer already facing DUI charges, and with felony …

Justin Bieber Drinks Wine, Enjoys “Classy Night” with Chantel Jeffries was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Justin Bieber is just trolling the police at this point.

With the singer already facing DUI charges, and with felony charges possibly on the way, Bieber posted a photo to Instagram Friday night of himself chugging some red wine.

The 19-year old, of course, is not of legal drinking age in the U.S.

“Classy night #painting,” Justin wrote as a caption, while rumored girlfriend Chantel Jeffries also unveiled an online picture that evening of wine, candles and strawberries. 

Check out the latest shot of Bieber on Instagram and then toggle through a number of other images from this social media account, including ones of Bieber shirtless, Bieber with Selena Gomez and more:

Justin Bieber Drinks Wine, Enjoys “Classy Night” with Chantel Jeffries was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Chantel Jeffries: I’m Not a Criminal! Leave Me Alone!
item.dc:creator: Free Britney
item.description:
Reading Time: 2 minutesChantel Jeffries is attempting to set the record straight regarding reports that she has a mile-long rap sheet, including an …

Chantel Jeffries: I’m Not a Criminal! Leave Me Alone! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 2 minutes

Chantel Jeffries is attempting to set the record straight regarding reports that she has a mile-long rap sheet, including an arrest for assault with a deadly weapon.

The 21-year-old model, who was riding shotgun in Justin Bieber’s rented Lamborghini when the singer was arrested for DUI, released a statement saying:

“I have been overwhelmed by the negative attention I have recently received in the media. My family and I are particularly upset about the false accusations.”

“For the record, I have not been arrested five times as has been stated in the media, nor am I guilty of physically assaulting anyone, in any way shape or form.”

“I am a full-time student who had enjoyed a normal lifestyle, free from public scrutiny and criticism, until now. What has happened to me is wrong.”

She does not deny all of the alleged arrests, it’s worth noting.

 

Chantel Jeffries continues with a plea for privacy, stating:

“I want people in general, and the media in particular, to consider the impact their disparaging comments have on the individual; especially when their comments are inaccurate.”

She did not address the purported NYC strip club offer.

According to reports, Chantel Jeffries was arrested when at age 18 for a misdemeanor assault, but the case was later dismissed due to insufficient evidence.

Other than that, her lawyer says the self-described “eyebrow connoisseur,” “animal lover” and “deep thinker” is only guilty of “traffic violations.”

She recently traveled to Panama with Bieber, 19, after he was bailed out of jail, and had been in talks to appear on Today to address these accusations.

That interview fell through, however. Such a bummer …

9 Flirty Photos of Chantel Jeffries

VIEW GALLERY

Chantel Jeffries: I’m Not a Criminal! Leave Me Alone! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.

item.title: Chantel Jeffries: Partying with Justin Bieber in Panama!
item.dc:creator: Kay Rhodes
item.description:
Reading Time: < 1 minuteIt looks like Usher isn’t the only person in Panama with Justin Bieber. With that mentor reportedly and a few …

Chantel Jeffries: Partying with Justin Bieber in Panama! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

It looks like Usher isn’t the only person in Panama with Justin Bieber.

With that mentor reportedly and a few others closer to the singer allegedly trying to steer Bieber in the proper direction, Chantel Jeffries has now made it clear:

She’s catching some rays in that country as well.

The model was photographed on the beach with Bieber Sunday and then included the above picture on Instagram yesterday, writing as a caption so everyone know exactly where she is:

"Panamanian tan."

 

Chantel Jeffries, of course, was in the passenger seat of Biebr’s sports car last Thursday night when it got pulled over for speeding and Bieber got arrested for DUI.

A relative unknown in the modeling world, Chantel has gone on to make news of her own since that incident.

She’s even been offered $25,000 by a famous New York City strip club to host a few Web cam events.

She’s also been receiving some online flak, it appears, as Jeffries took to Twitter earlier this week and wrote: “When crazy things happen, you find out who your real friends are.”

And it appears as if Bieber is one of those real friends. With benefits, we’re guessing.

9 Flirty Photos of Chantel Jeffries

VIEW GALLERY

Chantel Jeffries: Partying with Justin Bieber in Panama! was originally published on The Hollywood Gossip.
